source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_00<tab>Lyse thinks it is time you returned to Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのリセは、ドマについて知ったことを反芻しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_01<tab>Having spoken with the Doman refugees of Revenant's Toll, you have gained a greater understanding of their homeland, as has Lyse. Duly educated, you depart for Limsa Lominsa, where Captain Carvallain and the crew of the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var> are preparing for your journey to the other side of the world.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_01<tab>「暁の血盟」は、反撃の望みをかけ、アラミゴと同じくゼノスの管轄下にあるドマの解放運動に手を貸すことになった。ドマは、はるか東の果て、東州オサード小大陸にある。渡航に際して、海賊カルヴァランや、レヴナンツトールにいるドマの民の協力を得ることができた。リムサ・ロミンサのフェリードックにいる「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_02<tab>Returned from their various errands, Alphinaud and the others may board the ship at any time. As is all too often the case, however, Alphinaud elects to let you “do the honors” and inform the deckhand of you and your comrades' readiness.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_02<tab>アルフィノと話し、いよいよ東方に向けて出発することになった。フェリードックの「百鬼夜行の甲板員」と話し、ミゼリー号に乗船しよう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_03Before you and Alisaie board the Misery, Urianger arrives bearing a cryptic warning and a practical gift: a rapier made for your young companion. Moved by the gesture, her steely demeanor softens, and you sense that the rift between the two may have finally begun to heal. Alas, there is no time for further conversation, as Carvallain declares that it is time to depart.

The voyage is smooth and almost entirely uneventful... Almost. On a day like any other, while conversing with your comrades and the captain below deck, the ship lurches violently. Moments later a deckhand barges into the room, speaking of strange things in the water, and a mysterious force dragging the Misery off course. With a sigh, Carvallain goes to investigate─but not before asking you to join him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_03ウリエンジェに見送られ、ミゼリー号に乗船して出航した。順調な船旅だったが、何か異変が起きたようだ。ミゼリー号の甲板にいる「カルヴァラン」と話そう。
一度エオルゼアに帰還した場合は、リムサ・ロミンサのフェリードックにいる「百鬼夜行の甲板員」に話しかけると、再度乗船できるようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_04Though he puts no stock in Sea Wolf superstitions and faerie tales, Carvallain explains to you that the “things” in the water his sailors refuse to name are the souls of deceased women said to lure sailors to their deaths. Though the very thought is enough to cause Alphinaud considerable distress, Alisaie flatly concludes that whatever the cause of your troubles, you have no recourse but to surrender to the current, let it take the Misery where it will, and deal with whatever you find there. Carvallain duly agrees, and the matter is settled.

Once you arrive at your unknown destination, most will stay with the ship, but you and the fellow adventurers that you had the wisdom and foresight to invite to accompany you on this long journey to the Far East will proceed ashore and seek out the fiend responsible for your troubles.

※The Sirensong Sea can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_04カルヴァランから、船乗りに伝わる伝承について聞いた。事態を収拾し、東方への航路に戻るため、「漂流海域 セイレーン海」に乗り込もう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_05<tab>With the demise of the mysterious being the sailors call Lorelei, the clouds part, leaving you and your comrades free to resume your journey aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var>. But what wonders await you in distant Kugane?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_05船を呼び寄せていたローレライを倒した。ミゼリー号に戻り、再びクガネにむけて出港しよう。
一度エオルゼアに帰還した場合は、リムサ・ロミンサのフェリードックにいる「百鬼夜行の甲板員」に話しかけると、再度乗船できるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_06<tab>As the ship sails into port, you and your comrades line the deck, marveling at the many colors of the city. From the corner of your eye you spy Lyse, standing apart from the others, her lips moving silently. A prayer or an oath, perhaps. But it is not for you to know...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_06航海を再開し、無事にひんがしの国のクガネに到着した。クガネの第二波止場にいる「カルヴァラン」と話そう。
一度エオルゼアに帰還した場合は、リムサ・ロミンサのフェリードックにいる「百鬼夜行の甲板員」に話しかけると、クガネに移動できるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_07<tab>And so you disembark, strangers in a strange land. What wonders and perils await you in this island nation on the far side of the world?
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_SEQ_07<tab>予想外の冒険はあったものの、難破することなく入港することができ、カルヴァランも一安心したようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alphinaud at the ferry docks.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_00<tab>リムサ・ロミンサのアルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Kraken's Arms deckhand.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_01<tab>百鬼夜行の甲板員と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Carvallain.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_02<tab>カルヴァランと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_03<tab>Use the Duty Finder to enter the Sirensong Sea.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_03<tab>「漂流海域 セイレーン海」を攻略

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TODO_04<tab>Use the Duty Finder to enter the Sirensong Sea.

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_001<tab>Right. No point waiting around here, is there?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_001ともかく、ドマ出身の人たちに、
直接、話を聞くことができたのはよかったよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_002<tab>We should head back to Limsa Lominsa. Alphinaud said to meet at the ferry docks, I think?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_002情報収集は、この辺りで切り上げて、
そろそろ「リムサ・ロミンサ」に向かおうか。
確か「フェリードック」のあたりで集合だったよね？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_010<tab>It's times like this I'm glad we've got Tataru taking care of business.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_010<tab>こういうときのタタルって、頼りになるよね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>"An army marches on its stomach.“ Tataru took that lesson to heart.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_015補給なくして勝利なし、これ戦の常道なり。
まさにタタルは、「暁の血盟」の生命線だわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TATARU_000_020<tab>A surfeit of sumptuous foods, wondrous sundries, plenty of clean undergarments... Yes, I do believe we have everything we need for a lengthy voyage!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TATARU_000_020衣服から食料まで、長旅に必要な品々は、
バッチリ買いそろえておきまっした！
このタタルが「暁」初の東方遠征を成功に導きまっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_025<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var> is the finest ship ever to sail the Rhotano, and I'll not hear any man say otherwise!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_025俺たちの船の名は「ミゼリー号」。
目標と定めた船には、必ず痛みをもたらす最強の船だ。
この航海、誰にも邪魔はさせやしねぇよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>You are returned, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I trust you learned much from our Doman friends in Revenant's Toll.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>、おつかれさま。
レヴナンツトールでの情報収集は終わったようだね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>I am eager to hear all─though that can wait until we have left port. We will have time enough to talk on our journey to Kugane.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_031仕入れた情報については、船上で聞かせてくれないか？
経由地である「クガネ」まででも相当な長旅になるから、
じっくりと話すことができるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_032<tab>Our spice-trading friends have completed their preparations. Assuming you have completed yours, you may inform the deckhand that we are ready to depart.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_032出港準備も整ったそうだ。
そちらにいる「百鬼夜行の甲板員」に声をかければ、
船まで案内してくれるそうだから、さっそく乗船するとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_100_033<tab>Something left undone, my friend? If not, let us be off.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_100_033出港準備も整ったそうだ。
そちらにいる「百鬼夜行の甲板員」に声をかければ、
船まで案内してくれるそうだから、さっそく乗船するとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_033<tab>All set, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? I'll see you to the ship if so.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_033おう、出港準備はできてるぜ。
俺たちの船、「ミゼリー号」はこっちだ……
埠頭まで付いてきてくれや。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Board the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>海賊船「ミゼリー号」に乗船しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_100_035<tab>How in the blue blazes did you─ Ugh, naught for it but to get our fastest ship to take you to the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_100_035おいおい、なんでここにいるんだ？
「ミゼリー号」は、もう出港しちまっているぞ！
仕方ない、小型船で送ってやろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_035<tab>This ain't right. This ain't right at all.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_035<tab>いったい、どうなってやがるんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_040<tab>Hmm... Odd. Most odd.
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_040<tab>この潮の流れ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>Well? Do you have any idea what's going on?
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>何があったのです？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_042<tab>...No. As the man said, despite the absence of wind and current, the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var> is somehow being pulled off course.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_042……船が流されています。
ほとんど風もなく、潮の流れも止まっているというのに、
何かに引き寄せられるように、船が動いているのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_043<tab>Well, why not fire up the ceruleum engines you have hidden below?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_043この船って、青燐機関を積んでいるのよね？
誰かが動力を勝手に動かしているという線はないの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_044<tab>An excellent suggestion based on knowledge you should not have. Alas, our engines appear to be malfunctioning for reasons that escape my engineers at present...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_044原因不明の不調で、青燐機関は停止中……。
むしろ動力を使って、本来の航路に戻りたいところですが、
今のところ、修理すらままならない状況です。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_045<tab>I'm telling you, Captain, it's them...<var 1A 02 /var>things<var 1A 01 /var> the lads saw...
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_045<tab>お、お頭、これは本当に例のヤツが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>"Things“? I don't suppose I could convince you to attempt something more descriptive? An adjective, for example.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_046失礼、先ほどから話に出ている、
例のヤツというのは、いったい何なのです？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_047<tab>Sea Wolf superstitions and faerie tales, naught more... But if you must know, the “things” which he is so reticent to name are the souls of deceased women said to lure sailors to their deaths.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_047やれやれ、くだらない迷信ですよ。
ゼーヴォルフ族の船乗りに伝わる伝承で、死んだ女の魂が、
男たちを誘って船を縄張りに引き寄せ、難破させるのだとか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_048<tab>P-P-Preposterous!
target: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_048<tab>ば、ば、ば、馬鹿な……！！

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_049<tab>Yeees, indeed... If it is neither the sea nor the weather which is responsible, then it is probably a predatory entity of some sort─perhaps a siren or some such.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_049あきれた……本当に馬鹿ね……。
これが自然現象でも操船ミスでもないなら、
何らかの生物ないし、それに準じる存在の介入ということでしょ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>For all we know, it could be a fellow “spice trader” employing magicks to seize and plunder passing vessels.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_050死人の魂はともかくとして、
死霊術や魅了術に長けたセイレーン族の生き残りか、
精神操作系の魔法を得意とする妖異ってところが妥当じゃない？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>Regardless, we have but one recourse: to let the current take us where it will, and deal with whatever we find there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_051だったら解決策はひとつ！
このまま引き寄せられるに任せて、
たどり着いた先で、黒幕をブッ倒す……それでお終いよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_052<tab>What a thoroughly pragmatic suggestion. Oh, I am beginning to like you, girl.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_052ふむ、論理的な推測かつ、的確な戦術に思えます。
付け加えるなら、黒幕が何者であれ、船を乗っ取られないよう、
「ミゼリー号」を守る者も必要という点でしょうか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_053<tab>I assure you the feeling is not mutual. Once we arrive at our destination, be it a vessel or an island or something else, Lyse and I will remain with the ship to defend it in case of attack. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I believe you would be the ideal choice to venture forth and deal with the cause of our troubles.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_053そうね……船の防衛は、私とリセたちで請け負うわ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>は、黒幕の捜索と排除をお願いできて？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_054<tab>Then it is settled! I know not what awaits us, but it will rue the day it reeled us in!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_054決まりね……！
何者かは知らないけど、
私たちの旅路を邪魔したツケを、払わしてやりましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_055<tab>I'll make sure Tataru stays below deck until we know it's safe.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_055タタルには、船室で大人しくしているように言っておいたよ。
戦闘になったら、危ないからさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Alphinaud was terrified of ghost stories as a child. I'm glad to see that some things never change.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_060アルフィノって、昔から怪談話の類いに弱いのよね。
今でも直ってないなんて、笑っちゃうわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>Wh-What? Why are you looking at me like that? I am calm and collected as ever! Carry on!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_065ど、動揺なんてしていないッ！
私は冷静だよッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_070<tab>I'm not saying that I believe beyond a shadow of a doubt that vengeful spirits are plotting our demise at this very moment! I'm just saying we cannot discount the possibility!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_070俺だって、本気で伝承を信じてるわけじゃねぇさ。
だが、こうして船が不可解な動きをしていると、
何かの介入を疑いたくなるってもんだろ？

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_075<tab>(The fiery one─Alisaie, was it? 'Tis a pity she holds our profession in such disdain. She would make an <var 1A 02 /var>excellent<var 1A 01 /var> pirate.)
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_075あのエレゼン族のお嬢さん、アリゼー女史といいましたか……。
若いながらも、知力と胆力を兼ね備えているようですね。
今から鍛えれば、いい海賊になれるでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_076<tab>Glad that's over and done with. Sorry about the delay, eh? We'll be in Kugane before you know it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_076こんな海域にとどまるのは、まっぴらごめんだ！
とっととクガネに向けて出港しようぜ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_080<tab>I...I don't know what I was expecting, but it wasn't this.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_LYSE_000_080港街って言うから、
リムサ・ロミンサみたいなところを想像してたけど、
ぜんぜん違って、びっくりだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>It's very...colorful, is it not?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALISAIE_000_085それにしても、すごい街並みね。
色が溢れ出して、洪水を起こしているみたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>By the Twelve, I have never been happier to be back on terra firma... Our voyage has instilled in me a new appreciation for surfaces which do not move of their own accord.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_ALPHINAUD_000_090ふぅ……やはり、揺れない床というのはいいものだね。
久方ぶりに上陸して、その有難味がよくわかったよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TATARU_000_095<tab>Strange... Is it just me, or is the ground swaying?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_TATARU_000_095あまりに長いこと、船に揺られていたので、
なんだか今でも、ゆらゆら揺れているような気がしまっす。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_100<tab>Thanks again for, uh, saving us from certain death at the hands of Lorelei and whatnot. We'll not soon forget it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_100ローレライの一件じゃ、世話になったな。
お前の武勇伝は、船乗りたちの間で語り継がれることだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_110<tab>Congratulations. You now stand in Kugane, the western port of Hingashi. Regrettably, the only port in this nation open to foreign trade.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_110ようやくの到着ですね。
ここがクガネ……鎖国中の「ひんがしの国」において、
唯一、異国の船に開かれた港街です。

source: TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_111<tab>Oh, and I do apologize for the unforeseen difficulties which befell us during our journey. Needless to say, your assistance in overcoming them was much appreciated.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA139_02469_CARVALLAIN_000_111途中、想定外の妨害者が現れましたが、
貴方のおかげで、「ミゼリー号」は沈むことはなかった。
こうして、無事に到着できたことを感謝しますよ。
